text:
e="preserve">John Christopher Tynan (5 December 1925 – 23 August 2020) was a New Zealand field hockey player and cricketer. He represented New Zealand in field hockey between 1948 and 1956, including at the 1956 Olympic Games in Melbourne.
He played four first-class cricket matches for Wellington between 1952 and 1954.
Tynan died on 23 August 2020, aged 94.
